page.title: 18Brunton Park
page.content: { {Brunton}park is situated on the west side of the great north road, opposite north Gosforth.We surveyed the west side of the estate. Brunton park is a post war mature estate.Most of the houses are{semi {detatched}although there are quite a few{detached houses}and{bungalows including Dutch bungalows. There is a small site of Maissonettes on the estate,and also some small shops in the centre of Brunton park,most of which had small flats above them. This area is very quiet and a close community. Most of the houses looked very new with extensions and large garages etc.
